original_title: Golden Voice, Golden Years: Pandit Jasraj
overview: One of India's best-known classical music vocalists, Pandit Jasraj has recorded and performed extensively for more than half a century. He reflects on his life and achievements in this musical memoir. Jasraj, raised by his older brother after their father died, remembers his early years as a solo vocalist and pays ample tribute to the people who influenced him, particularly ghazal and thumri legend Begum Akhtar.
title: Golden Voice, Golden Years: Pandit Jasraj
